title: New: Woman's Hour – Darkest Place
body:
I’m a sucker for this sort of pop.

Lethargic synths and wistful female vocals, London quartet **Woman’s Hour** tug on the heartstrings with their latest offering, _Darkest Place_. Twisting and turning before collapsing into a swirling haze of delightful ‘ooo’s and tinkling keys, it’s their most enticing outing to date. Check out _Darkest Place_ below, and keep up with the quartet via [Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/womanshourband).
